ygData.subject: Re: note to self
ygData.msgSnippet: Just be glad you re on Lvl 40, I m Lvl 16 and it seems like it MIGHT be another 3-4 or more days to hit the next Lvl.  But I m not really wanting to rush to
ygData.messageBody:
Just be glad you're on Lvl 40, I'm Lvl 16 and it seems like it MIGHT be
another 3-4 or more days to hit the next Lvl. But I'm not really wanting to
rush to Lvl 50, I'm just having fun and getting Lvl's when I get them, if I
got a Lvl everyday hey that'd be cool with me if it took me many days to hit
the next Lvl thats cool. I do wanna get up to Lvl 24 fast tho but not real
fast, just wanna get it 24 so the look of my spells change. I did find a
place that I can get nice exp (gotta be in a group of at least one or two
more), I like one in this area cause if it's more then 2 ppl in the group we
don't seem to get as much exp and it sux. With me and my friend we get good
exp but let one other join and that exp goes bye-bye.
But I think everyone should just take their time on getting to Lvl 50, cause
what happens when you hit 50? Thats it no more, I mean you can still play
it but I'd say after a while it's bound to get boring. Can't Lvl anymore,
won't be getting any exp all you can do is get money and weapons and armor
and hope Verant up's the Lvl limit. But from what I've read they don't even
know if they will up it at all. In a way I think they should tho, I'd say
if they do it should be up to Lvl 75 to a 100 and thats all. Of course once
you hit Lvl 50 you can start a new character or just work on one you already
have and get him/her to 50.
But I know some likes to play and get Lvl's fast some of us likes to play
and get Lvl's just whenever. So other words play it however you have the
most fun! And enjoy the game! =)

**************************
Azor
Lvl 16 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> ok note to self.....17 lv 40-50's can't take on Lord Negafen without
> losing 2/3 of the ppl.....BUT we do plan on trying it again in a few
> weeks when more of us are lv 50....now my problem, how the heck to i get
> out of lv 40?? i'm now a bar and a half into it, and i've been on it for
> about 4 days now...THAT'S how hard that lv is...and i've been playing
> for about 8 hours + each time ):.....just to let you all know how hard
> those barrier lvs are (;
>
> (\/)ystix Spellchaser
> lv 40 <got hit 5 times by negafen and died inside his lair>
> human cleric of The Rathe
>
>
